${modID}:Cylooped.NAME: Cylooped
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards with the #yCyloop #yFinisher tag will trigger additional effects. Applying this effect again will consume both and the affected creature will lose #b
% of their max HP, depending on whichever is the highest.

${modID}:Invincible.NAME: Invincible
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce ALL damage received to #b0 this turn.
